meanings.definition: To make a loud, heavy sound.
meanings.sent1: He accidentally clonkyed the pots and pans while cooking.
meanings.sent2: The hammer clonkyed loudly against the metal surface.
meanings.sent3: The kids clonkyed the pots together to create a rhythm.
meanings.sent4: The old clock clonkyed every hour, reminding them of time.
meanings.sent5: The thunder clonkyed in the distance, signaling an approaching storm.
